Clarification

  * Available immediately after application (assuming login information for the management screen is emailed immediately)
  * processing of bank transfer ? (manual such screenshot) gateway to use
  * scope of managing nippo kun from administration account
  * scope of manage referral code
  * password is autogenerated after registration
  * Email server smtp use.
  * retention of files after the expiration of subscription
  * after free period you can use the service by closing the account at the end of the month and paying at the end of the following month
march 31 (end of free period) apr1 to April (30)(end of following month due dat of payment)

**you can use the service by closing the account at the end of the month** and paying at the end of the following month.

**closing (logout?)**
